last_episode_to_air.name: Eyes closed
last_episode_to_air.overview: Nathan discovers Pierre and his vision which allows him to see the invisible ones. In exchange for finding Lily, Pierre helps Nathan and his team to collect in the houses the invisible ones they need for their tests. They put them to sleep with gas to take them by force to the hospital. Laurence discovers that Nathan has locked his daughter up with other invisible people. With no choice left, she launches the operation against the antenna.

name: Unseen
overview: The fiction series UNSEEN tells the story of how, over ten days, people and their families face a mysterious phenomenon : some of them become invisible. Out of sight, the invisibles can do anything without being seen, nobody to punish them, nobody to compliment them, nobody to judge them, - But is it really an advantage? Some of them are using invisibility as a tool of revenge or domination, others live it as an exile. But all of them will have to make a moral choice: is their invisibility a power or a handicap? What is left for humanity when no one can see us anymore? Facing the unimaginable, seen and unseen will try, each in their own way, to save their own world.

episodes.name: Blindness
episodes.overview: Victor, a renowned ophthalmologist from Creux, becomes mysteriously blind during a routine cataract operation that turns into a nightmare. It was his daughter, Laurence, an ophthalmic surgeon who was in charge of this operation. In addition to the guilt that gnaws at her, Laurence must face the accusations of her professional and personal entourage. Laurence knows something was wrong during the operation, but no one believes her.

episodes.name: An imaginary friend
episodes.overview: Lily, hidden with her blind grandfather who does not suspect a thing, discovers another intruder there. Angèle. An elderly woman, naked, asleep on the living room sofa next to her grandfather. Suddenly Angèle wakes up, and face to face with Lily, immediately becomes invisible. To prevent Lily from divulging the secret of her invisibility, Angèle offers Lily to take her to her home where she can make her invisible as well.

episodes.name: Patient zero
episodes.overview: Ayoub, in a relationship with Valérie, and Theo's dad (8 years old) has to deal with his wife's depression and her recent placement in a rehab center on a daily basis. But now he also has to face a sudden shameful situation: he becomes invisible. He immediately goes to the emergency room. To avoid sowing panic, Nathan, Laurence's husband and director of the Creux hospital, locks up Ayoub against his will in order to be able to manage him in the greatest secrecy.

episodes.name: Contagion
episodes.overview: After a night of detention, Ayoub manages to escape. He must absolutely come to an appointment with the social worker for the care of his son. But invisible, he risks triggering everyone's panic and losing custody of Theo. Theo must become his accomplice. But for that, he must reveal his invisibility to him ... without traumatizing him.

episodes.name: The epidemic
episodes.overview: Other cases of invisibility arise. In an inaccessible part of the hospital, linked to Victor's past, Nathan organizes a quarantine. He also absolutely has to find Ayoub his patient zero, who could help him better understand the epidemic. Laurence, for her part, is convinced that the epidemic of invisibility is linked to the electromagnetic pollution of the new 5G antenna in Creux. She resumes her fight against the antenna.

episodes.name: As far as the eye can see
episodes.overview: Under the gaze of the police who don't see her, Angèle pushes Lily from the top of a bridge and makes people believe in suicide. The announcement of the suicide collapses Laurence and Nathan. Laurence understands that Nathan lied to her, and that he too knows that there are invisible ones. Their couple breaks up.

episodes.name: Eye for an eye
episodes.overview: Threatened by Angèle, Laurence decides to take her father and Lily to the EHS camp, which is sheltered from the Antenna waves in a blank zone outside the city. Laurence reveals Lily's invisibility to EHSs and rallies with those who have long wanted to take action and destroy the antenna rather than negotiating with the authorities.

episodes.name: Eyes closed
episodes.overview: Nathan discovers Pierre and his vision which allows him to see the invisible ones. In exchange for finding Lily, Pierre helps Nathan and his team to collect in the houses the invisible ones they need for their tests. They put them to sleep with gas to take them by force to the hospital. Laurence discovers that Nathan has locked his daughter up with other invisible people. With no choice left, she launches the operation against the antenna.
